entities.name: platform nine and three-quarters
entities.description: The barrier of platform nine and three-quarters is mentioned as a specific location that Harry needs to pass through.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, and he is being greeted by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's relative, and he is standing suspiciously near Mr. and Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as being present at the scene, along with his wife.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley hugs Harry in greeting and seems to be friendly towards him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as yelling after Harry as he bids goodbye.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being present and bidding goodbye to Harry.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig's cage is being wheeled by Harry towards Uncle Vernon.

relationships.description: Harry greets Uncle Vernon in his usual fashion.
Uncle Vernon is standing near Mr. Weasley and Mrs. Weasley.
Mrs. Weasley hugs Harry in greeting.
Ron yells after Harry as he bids goodbye.
